thread.title: Save more than 50% on the Man Booker Prize winning novel 2015
thread.title_full: Save more than 50% on the Man Booker Prize winning novel 2015 - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save more than 50% on the Man Booker Prize winning novel 2015
text: The critically acclaimed A Brief History of Seven Killings by Marlon James was announced as the winner of the Man Booker Prize 2015 on Tuesday night. This mesmerising novel chronicles the lives of a host of unforgettable characters. Seven gunmen storm Bob Marley’s house, machine guns blazing. The reggae superstar survives, but the gunmen are never caught. Gripping and inventive, A Brief History of Seven Killings has been hailed as one of the most remarkable and extraordinary novels of the 21st century. ‘A vivid novel that deserves all the praise it has received’ - The Sunday Telegraph Telegraph readers can claim an exlcuisve 50% off the novel at WHSmith High Street stores, RRP £8.99. How to claim See the newspaper on Sunday, October 18, 2015. telegraph.co.uk
